title: Simplify Development Task UI by removing unnecessary workflow links
description: Streamline the Development Task interface by removing Branch, PR creation, and Rebase links to create a cleaner, more focused user experience that reduces cognitive load and improves task completion efficiency
iWant: to have a simplified Development Task interface without cluttered workflow links
soThat: I can focus on core development activities without UI distractions and complete tasks more efficiently
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is removed from Development Task interface
PR created and ready for development link is removed
Rebase link is removed from the UI
Core Development Task functionality remains intact
UI maintains clean and intuitive design after link removal
